name: Fix Constructor Not Found and Proguard Rules Addition
body:
# Features
1. This release fixes the **constructor not found exception** when minify is enabled. 
2. The proguard rules are added to keep the classes annotated with `@Layout`  along with the generated classes required by the library

# Note:
A new annotation `@Keep` is added for the purpose of keeping the class and its methods when minify is enabled. This was required by the library so to reference the generated classes for the item views. 
**This annotations as a by product can be utilised by the client code to prevent any class from being obfuscated.**

name: @Recycle callback and RecyclableEditText
PlaceHolderView sort, Swipe Stack Head Callback, Fix Expand ChildView Order
Fix Abrupt Swipe Animation
body:
### The Swipe Animation while changing the direction of swipe caused jumps. This is fixed in this release.

`setSwipeMaxChangeAngle` method has been added to the `SwipeDecor` that defines the maximum angle change allowed for subsequent card movement while swiping. 

### Example: 
For allowing only up to 1 degree rotation increment (default is 2 degrees) keep it smaller for smoother animation.
```java
swipeDecor().setSwipeMaxChangeAngle(1f)
```

### Suggestion:
For smooth transition of card rotation keep `setHeightSwipeDistFactor` and `setWidthSwipeDistFactor` smaller and `setSwipeMaxChangeAngle` less than 2 degrees(default).
```java
mSwipeView.getBuilder()
               .setHeightSwipeDistFactor(8)
               .setWidthSwipeDistFactor(4)
```

name: SwipeDirectionalView(Swipe Directions), Swipe Touch Callback, Animated Undo, Programmatically Expand/Collapse ExpandablePlaceHolderView
Addition of getAllResolvers() into SwipePlaceHolderView
ItemRemovedListener added for SwipePlaceHolderView
RecyclerView version update and removeAllViews method addition for SwipePlaceHolderView
body:
RecyclerView is updated to 25.+

``` groovy
com.android.support:recyclerview-v7:25.+
```

SwipePlaceHolderView can now remove all its child views to reset its empty state using:

``` java
mSwipePlaceHolderView.removeAllViews();
```

name: Swipe Option addition
body:
1. This release clubs all the non UI options into SwipeOption class. It will fix the Options of SwipePlaceHolderView to reset to default when new SwipeDecor class is passed to the Builder class.
2. `mSwipePlaceHolderView.deActivatePutBack()` is renamed to `mSwipePlaceHolderView.deactivatePutBack()`

name: Disable Swipe on Touch
Dynamic view margin, Undo last swipe, Putback swiped view, Lock view
Click and Long Click dynamic binding for SwipePlaceHolderView
body: `@Click` and `@LongClick`  for SwipePlaceHolderView will now be activated when the stack card view comes to the top

name: Item View refresh methods and get position method before bind
body:
This update adds below methods to the PlaceHolderView
1. `<T>int getViewResolverPosition(T resolver)`: This will give the position of the class object which is added as the item view, even before the item view is binded to the window.
2. `<T>void refreshView(T resolver)`: This will refresh the item view after new data is added based on the class object reference added as item view.
3. `public void refreshView(int position)`: This will refresh the item view after new data is added based on the position of item view.

name: Swipe calculation w.r.t the initial touch point
body:
This update calculates the swipe with-respect-to initial touch point. Earlier versions used to calculate swipe w.r.t. on the coordinate center being the actual screen center.

This enables swiping even from the edges of the cards correctly as opposed to earlier version.

name: programmatically doSwipe message display fix
body: doSwipe method call for programmatically doing swipe will now display accept/reject message views

name: SwipeView addition and SwipeDecor modifications
body:
SwipeView annotation is added. It will help to get a reference to the swipeable view.
SwipeDecor has additions to specify view height, width and gravity.

name: New InfinitePlaceHolderView and SwipePlaceHolderView image freeze fix
body:
InfinitePlaceHolderView: This class has been added to show load more style of view loading when the last item has been seen.
SwipePlaceHolderView image freezing when rapid swipe is done is also fixed

name: RecyclerView update
body:
This version is build upon Support RecyclerView v7:24.+
It's an update from previous RecyclerView v7:23.+
The project using this version should compile using compileSdkVersion 24

name: Touch Listener bug fix
body: The fix for touch pointer issue

name: Non blocking swipe
body: The swipe card will pass the touch event to its children if it's less than a click else it will consume the touch event for the swipe

name: Stable version
body: This release contains PlaceHolderView, ExpandablePlaceHolderView and SwipePlaceHolderView modules
